titles: A timelie cavtion comprehended in thirty seven double trimeters occasioned by a late rumour of an intention, suddenly to adjourn this Parliament, and superscribed to those whome it most concernes, September 10, 1652 / by G.W. ...
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to George Wither. cf. NUC pre-1956.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Puritan Revolution, 1642-1660 --  Poetry.
